thread.title: Monarch launches more flights after Tunisia cancellation
thread.title_full: Monarch launches more flights after Tunisia cancellation

title: Monarch launches more flights after Tunisia cancellation
text:
Monarch launches more flights after Tunisia cancellation 16 July 2015 Save 
Monarch has announced a raft of new flights for summer 2015 following the cancellation of its Tunisia programme. 
Going on sale today, additional Gatwick flights on Wednesday and Sunday bring the total to Alicante to 14 per week from July 22 to November 1 while an additional flight ex-Gatwick to Barcelona from July 24 to August 7 will bring the total to eight per week. 
From Manchester, an additional Wednesday flight to Malaga from July 22 to October 28 brings the total to 12 while a Manchester Alicante additional Sunday flight will operate from July 26 to November 1. 
The additional flights will mean a further 20,000 seats will be available throughout the summer with prices leading in at Â£49.99.
